description: Elevate your UofT tracking experience with TTBTrackr's UofT module. The Original TTBTrackr Module ðŸ˜€

fields.name: Track Existing Course Activities
fields.value: Effortlessly monitor vacancies in ongoing course activities using `/uoft track existing`. Remember to include the campus code in your course code (e.g., CSC148**H5** instead of just CSC148). TTBTrackr will utilize your profile to send you direct messages upon vacancy discoveries.

fields.name: Track New Course Sections
fields.value: Stay informed about new course sections by employing `/uoft track new`. Ensure to provide the campus code in your course code (e.g., CSC148H5 instead of just CSC148). When new sections emerge, TTBTrackr will notify you via direct messages based on your profile.

fields.name: Remove Tracked Courses
fields.value: Untrack courses using `/uoft untrack`. Specify the complete course code (including H/Y and campus codes), semester, and activity code you wish to remove. For instance, to untrack CSC148H5 LEC0101 in the Fall, use /uoft untrack CSC148H5 LEC0101 F. Your tracked courses can be viewed through /uoft list.

fields.name: View Tracked Courses
fields.value: To review all your tracked courses, utilize /uoft list. This command will furnish you with a comprehensive list of the courses you are currently tracking.
